import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-terms-of-service', templateUrl: './terms-of-service.component.html', styleUrls: ['./terms-of-service.component.css'] }) export class TermsOfServiceComponent { }

Terms of Service

Last updated: April 5, 2024

Agreement to Terms

By accessing or using Thrifto's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

Account Registration

To use certain features of our service, you must register for an account. You agree to:

  • Provide accurate and complete information
  • Maintain the security of your account
  • Promptly update your account information
  • Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

User Conduct

When using our services, you agree not to:

  • Violate any applicable laws or regulations
  • Infringe on intellectual property rights
  • Post false, misleading, or fraudulent content
  • Harass, abuse, or harm other users
  • Interfere with the proper functioning of the service
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems

Listing and Selling

When listing items for sale, you must:

  • Accurately describe the item's condition
  • Set fair and reasonable prices
  • Own or have the right to sell the item
  • Comply with our prohibited items policy
  • Ship items within the specified timeframe

Buying

As a buyer, you agree to:

  • Pay for items you commit to purchase
  • Provide accurate shipping information
  • Follow our return policy guidelines
  • Communicate respectfully with sellers

Fees and Payments

By using our services, you agree to:

  • Pay all applicable fees and charges
  • Provide valid payment information
  • Accept our payment processing terms
  • Pay any applicable taxes

Sellers are responsible for paying commission fees on successful sales as outlined in our Seller Agreement.

Intellectual Property

All content on our platform, including but not limited to:

  • Logos and trademarks
  • Website design and interface
  • Text and graphics
  • Software and functionality

are the property of Thrifto and are protected by intellectual property laws.

Limitation of Liability

Thrifto is not liable for:

  • Actions of users on the platform
  • Quality or condition of items sold
  • Disputes between users
  • Loss of profits or data
  • Technical issues or service interruptions

Termination

We reserve the right to:

  • Suspend or terminate accounts
  • Remove or edit content
  • Deny service to anyone
  • Change or discontinue services

at our sole discretion and without prior notice.

Changes to Terms

We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

Contact Information

For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

Email: legal@thrifto.com

Phone: 1-800-555-1234

Address: 123 Fashion Street, New York, NY 10001
